cannabisPriorityStatus.phrase1: It sounds like you're eligible as ${type1}
cannabisPriorityStatus.phrase2: It sounds like you're eligible as ${type1} and ${type2}
cannabisPriorityStatus.phrase3: It sounds like you're eligible as ${type1}, ${type2}, and ${type3}
cannabisPriorityStatus.tab1Content:
If you qualify for a priority status, your cannabis application can receive priority review and approval. There are three types of priority statuses, we list them here in the order they are expedited: Diversely-Owned Business, Social Equity Business, and Impact Zone Business. Qualifying for multiple priorities does not offer any benefit.

Learn more about how [priority status is reviewed and approved](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/businesses/priority-applications/).

- - -

## Priority Types

We can help you find out if you qualify for any priority status. Which of the following applies to your business?

* []{general-minority-owned}51% or more of your business is owned by a `minority|minority` 
* []{general-women-owned}51% or more of your business is owned by a `woman|women` 
* \[]{general-dvob}51% or more of your business is owned by a disabled veteran
* []{cannabis-criminal-offense-social-equity}Is owned by people with `convictions for cannabis-related offenses|social-equity-business-cannabis` (expunged or not)
* \[]{cannabis-economically-disadvantaged-social-equity}Owner lived in an [Economically Disadvantaged Area](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/businesses/priority-applications/eda.shtml) for 5 of the last 10 years AND have a household income 80% or less than the average median household income in New Jersey
* []{cannabis-business-in-impact-zone}My business is located in an `Impact Zone|impact-zone-business-cannabis` that allows cannabis businesses
* \[]{cannabis-owner-in-impact-zone}My business is owned by people who live in an Impact Zone
* \[]{cannabis-employee-in-impact-zone}My business has employees who are residents of an Impact Zone
